description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Freising, Germany. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Convenient Germany Mercure Escape near Munich Airport & Bavarian Old Town with Fitness Centre & Sauna
hotels.description: Touchdown at Mercure Hotel München Airport Freising, a stylish retreat just minutes from Munich International Airport. Whether you're flying in for business or kicking off a Bavarian adventure, this stylish hotel offers a comfortable base with modern rooms designed for restful layovers and leisurely stays alike. Ideally located between the picture-perfect town of Freising and Munich’s busy centre, this hotel offers the best of both worlds. Explore Freising's medieval cathedral and Bavarian old town just minutes away, or board a train to explore Munich's famous Marienplatz and Oktoberfest grounds. Beer enthusiasts will love the world's oldest brewery, Weihenstephan, just a short drive away.

seo.title: Hoteles en Freising - Germany Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
